processingCommand.script:
:DEFINE &AMODULES#, string, 20
:FILL &AMODULES#[] = STR_SPLIT("&MODULES#", ",")
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&AMODULES#[])

:SET &REST_MODULES#     = ""
:SET &REST_MODULES_DB#  = ""

:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  SWITCH "Y"
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*WMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "WMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "REFS"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*REFS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "REFS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*RW*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "RW,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "EMS"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*EMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "EMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "WMS-FAIL"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*WMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "WMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "REFS-FAIL"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*REFS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "REFS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "RW-FAIL"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*RW*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "RW,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "EMS-FAIL"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES#, "*EMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES#, "EMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "DB_WMS"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES_DB#, "*WMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES_DB#, "WMS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "DB_REFS"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES_DB#, "*REFS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES_DB#, "REFS,")
:      ENDIF
:    CASE &AMODULES#[&RUNVAR#] = "DB_EMS"
:      SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&REST_MODULES_DB#, "*EMS*")
:      IF &RET# = "N"
:        SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = STR_CAT(&REST_MODULES_DB#, "EMS,")
:      ENDIF
:  ENDSWITCH
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&REST_MODULES#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &REST_MODULES# = SUBSTR(&REST_MODULES#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES#,,WORKFLOW

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&REST_MODULES_DB#)
:IF &LENGTH# > 0
:  SET &LE# = &LENGTH# - 1
:  SET &REST_MODULES_DB# = SUBSTR(&REST_MODULES_DB#, 1, &LE#)
:ENDIF
:PUBLISH &REST_MODULES_DB#,,WORKFLOW

:IF &REST_MODULES_DB# = ""
:  SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_PRIMARY# = ""
:  SET &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_SECONDARY# = ""
:  SET &DB_DIRECTORY_NAME# = ""
:  SET &DB_BACKUP_PATH# = ""
:  SET &DB_RUN_MODE# = ""
:  PUBLISH &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_PRIMARY#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_MANAGEMENT_SERVER_SECONDARY#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_BACKUP_PATH#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &DB_RUN_MODE#,,WORKFLOW

:  SET &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &WMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

:  SET &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &REFS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW

:  SET &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_PORT# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_SID# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_USERNAME# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_PASSWORD# = ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_SCHEMA# = ""
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_PORT#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_SID#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_USERNAME#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,WORKFLOW
:  PUBLISH &EMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,WORKFLOW
:ENDIF
